item.title: Are Mushroom Grow Bag Guarantees Real? My Zombie MyCo Experience
item.description: After initial mushroom grow bags from Zombie MyCo failed to colonize, customer support promptly sent replacements, proving their bag guarantee is genuine and reliable.
